<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>HyperCode - Neurodivergent-Friendly Visual Coding</title>
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com" />
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin />
    <link
      href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=OpenDyslexic&display=swap"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
    <style>
      :root {
        /* Primitive Color Tokens */
        --color-white: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
        --color-black: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1);
        --color-cream-50: rgba(252, 252, 249, 1);
        --color-cream-100: rgba(255, 255, 253, 1);
        --color-gray-200: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1);
        --color-gray-300: rgba(167, 169, 169, 1);
        --color-gray-400: rgba(119, 124, 124, 1);
        --color-slate-500: rgba(98, 108, 113, 1);
        --color-brown-600: rgba(94, 82, 64, 1);
        --color-charcoal-700: rgba(31, 33, 33, 1);
        --color-charcoal-800: rgba(38, 40, 40, 1);
        --color-slate-900: rgba(19, 52, 59, 1);
        --color-teal-300: rgba(50, 184, 198, 1);
        --color-teal-400: rgba(45, 166, 178, 1);
        --color-teal-500: rgba(33, 128, 141, 1);
        --color-teal-600: rgba(29, 116, 128, 1);
        --color-teal-700: rgba(26, 104, 115, 1);
        --color-teal-800: rgba(41, 150, 161, 1);
        --color-red-400: rgba(255, 84, 89, 1);
        --color-red-500: rgba(192, 21, 47, 1);
        --color-orange-400: rgba(230, 129, 97, 1);
        --color-orange-500: rgba(168, 75, 47, 1);

        --color-brown-600-rgb: 94, 82, 64;
        --color-teal-500-rgb: 33, 128, 141;
        --color-slate-900-rgb: 19, 52, 59;
        --color-slate-500-rgb: 98, 108, 113;
        --color-red-500-rgb: 192, 21, 47;
        --color-red-400-rgb: 255, 84, 89;
        --color-orange-500-rgb: 168, 75, 47;
        --color-orange-400-rgb: 230, 129, 97;

        --color-bg-1: rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.08);
        --color-bg-2: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.08);
        --color-bg-3: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.08);
        --color-bg-4: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.08);
        --color-bg-5: rgba(147, 51, 234, 0.08);
        --color-bg-6: rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.08);
        --color-bg-7: rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.08);
        --color-bg-8: rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.08);

        --color-background: var(--color-cream-50);
        --color-surface: var(--color-cream-100);
        --color-text: var(--color-slate-900);
        --color-text-secondary: var(--color-slate-500);
        --color-primary: var(--color-teal-500);
        --color-primary-hover: var(--color-teal-600);
        --color-primary-active: var(--color-teal-700);
        --color-secondary: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.12);
        --color-secondary-hover: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.2);
        --color-secondary-active: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.25);
        --color-border: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.2);
        --color-btn-primary-text: var(--color-cream-50);
        --color-card-border: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.12);
        --color-card-border-inner: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.12);
        --color-error: var(--color-red-500);
        --color-success: var(--color-teal-500);
        --color-warning: var(--color-orange-500);
        --color-info: var(--color-slate-500);
        --color-focus-ring: rgba(var(--color-teal-500-rgb), 0.4);
        --color-select-caret: rgba(var(--color-slate-900-rgb), 0.8);

        --focus-ring: 0 0 0 3px var(--color-focus-ring);
        --focus-outline: 2px solid var(--color-primary);

        --font-family-base: "FKGroteskNeue", "Geist", "Inter", -apple-system,
          BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, sans-serif;
        --font-family-mono: "Berkeley Mono", ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco,
          Consolas, monospace;
        --font-size-xs: 11px;
        --font-size-sm: 12px;
        --font-size-base: 14px;
        --font-size-md: 14px;
        --font-size-lg: 16px;
        --font-size-xl: 18px;
        --font-size-2xl: 20px;
        --font-size-3xl: 24px;
        --font-size-4xl: 30px;
        --font-weight-normal: 400;
        --font-weight-medium: 500;
        --font-weight-semibold: 550;
        --font-weight-bold: 600;
        --line-height-tight: 1.2;
        --line-height-normal: 1.5;
        --letter-spacing-tight: -0.01em;

        --space-0: 0;
        --space-1: 1px;
        --space-2: 2px;
        --space-4: 4px;
        --space-6: 6px;
        --space-8: 8px;
        --space-10: 10px;
        --space-12: 12px;
        --space-16: 16px;
        --space-20: 20px;
        --space-24: 24px;
        --space-32: 32px;

        --radius-sm: 6px;
        --radius-base: 8px;
        --radius-md: 10px;
        --radius-lg: 12px;
        --radius-full: 9999px;

        --shadow-xs: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02);
        --shadow-sm: 0 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04), 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02);
        --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04),
          0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02);
        --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04),
          0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02);

        --duration-fast: 150ms;
        --duration-normal: 250ms;
        --ease-standard: cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1);

        --animation-speed: 1;
      }

      @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
        :root {
          --color-gray-400-rgb: 119, 124, 124;
          --color-teal-300-rgb: 50, 184, 198;
          --color-gray-300-rgb: 167, 169, 169;
          --color-gray-200-rgb: 245, 245, 245;

          --color-bg-1: rgba(29, 78, 216, 0.15);
          --color-bg-2: rgba(180, 83, 9, 0.15);
          --color-bg-3: rgba(21, 128, 61, 0.15);
          --color-bg-4: rgba(185, 28, 28, 0.15);
          --color-bg-5: rgba(107, 33, 168, 0.15);
          --color-bg-6: rgba(194, 65, 12, 0.15);
          --color-bg-7: rgba(190, 24, 93, 0.15);
          --color-bg-8: rgba(8, 145, 178, 0.15);

          --color-background: var(--color-charcoal-700);
          --color-surface: var(--color-charcoal-800);
          --color-text: var(--color-gray-200);
          --color-text-secondary: rgba(var(--color-gray-300-rgb), 0.7);
          --color-primary: var(--color-teal-300);
          --color-primary-hover: var(--color-teal-400);
          --color-primary-active: var(--color-teal-800);
          --color-secondary: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.15);
          --color-secondary-hover: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.25);
          --color-secondary-active: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.3);
          --color-border: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.3);
          --color-error: var(--color-red-400);
          --color-success: var(--color-teal-300);
          --color-warning: var(--color-orange-400);
          --color-info: var(--color-gray-300);
          --color-focus-ring: rgba(var(--color-teal-300-rgb), 0.4);
          --color-btn-primary-text: var(--color-slate-900);
          --color-card-border: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.2);
          --color-card-border-inner: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.15);
        }
      }

      [data-theme="dark"] {
        --color-gray-400-rgb: 119, 124, 124;
        --color-teal-300-rgb: 50, 184, 198;
        --color-gray-300-rgb: 167, 169, 169;
        --color-gray-200-rgb: 245, 245, 245;

        --color-bg-1: rgba(29, 78, 216, 0.15);
        --color-bg-2: rgba(180, 83, 9, 0.15);
        --color-bg-3: rgba(21, 128, 61, 0.15);
        --color-bg-4: rgba(185, 28, 28, 0.15);
        --color-bg-5: rgba(107, 33, 168, 0.15);
        --color-bg-6: rgba(194, 65, 12, 0.15);
        --color-bg-7: rgba(190, 24, 93, 0.15);
        --color-bg-8: rgba(8, 145, 178, 0.15);

        --color-background: var(--color-charcoal-700);
        --color-surface: var(--color-charcoal-800);
        --color-text: var(--color-gray-200);
        --color-text-secondary: rgba(var(--color-gray-300-rgb), 0.7);
        --color-primary: var(--color-teal-300);
        --color-primary-hover: var(--color-teal-400);
        --color-primary-active: var(--color-teal-800);
        --color-secondary: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.15);
        --color-secondary-hover: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.25);
        --color-secondary-active: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.3);
        --color-border: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.3);
        --color-error: var(--color-red-400);
        --color-success: var(--color-teal-300);
        --color-warning: var(--color-orange-400);
        --color-info: var(--color-gray-300);
        --color-focus-ring: rgba(var(--color-teal-300-rgb), 0.4);
        --color-btn-primary-text: var(--color-slate-900);
        --color-card-border: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.2);
        --color-card-border-inner: rgba(var(--color-gray-400-rgb), 0.15);
      }

      [data-theme="light"] {
        --color-brown-600-rgb: 94, 82, 64;
        --color-teal-500-rgb: 33, 128, 141;
        --color-slate-900-rgb: 19, 52, 59;

        --color-bg-1: rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.08);
        --color-bg-2: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.08);
        --color-bg-3: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.08);
        --color-bg-4: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.08);
        --color-bg-5: rgba(147, 51, 234, 0.08);
        --color-bg-6: rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.08);
        --color-bg-7: rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.08);
        --color-bg-8: rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.08);

        --color-background: var(--color-cream-50);
        --color-surface: var(--color-cream-100);
        --color-text: var(--color-slate-900);
        --color-text-secondary: var(--color-slate-500);
        --color-primary: var(--color-teal-500);
        --color-primary-hover: var(--color-teal-600);
        --color-primary-active: var(--color-teal-700);
        --color-secondary: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.12);
        --color-secondary-hover: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.2);
        --color-secondary-active: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.25);
        --color-border: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.2);
        --color-btn-primary-text: var(--color-cream-50);
        --color-card-border: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.12);
        --color-card-border-inner: rgba(var(--color-brown-600-rgb), 0.12);
        --color-error: var(--color-red-500);
        --color-success: var(--color-teal-500);
        --color-warning: var(--color-orange-500);
        --color-info: var(--color-slate-500);
        --color-focus-ring: rgba(var(--color-teal-500-rgb), 0.4);
      }

      [data-theme="high-contrast"] {
        --color-background: #000000;
        --color-surface: #1a1a1a;
        --color-text: #ffffff;
        --color-text-secondary: #cccccc;
        --color-primary: #00ffff;
        --color-primary-hover: #00cccc;
        --color-primary-active: #009999;
        --color-border: #ffffff;
        --color-card-border: #ffffff;
        --color-error: #ff0000;
        --color-success: #00ff00;
        --color-warning: #ffff00;
      }

      @font-face {
        font-family: "FKGroteskNeue";
        src: url("https://r2cdn.perplexity.ai/fonts/FKGroteskNeue.woff2")
          format("woff2");
      }

      * {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
      }

      body {
        font-family: var(--font-family-base);
        background-color: var(--color-background);
        color: var(--color-text);
        line-height: var(--line-height-normal);
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      body.font-opendyslexic {
        font-family: "OpenDyslexic", sans-serif;
      }

      body.font-small {
        font-size: 12px;
      }
      body.font-medium {
        font-size: 14px;
      }
      body.font-large {
        font-size: 16px;
      }
      body.font-xlarge {
        font-size: 18px;
      }

      .skip-link {
        position: absolute;
        top: -40px;
        left: 0;
        background: var(--color-primary);
        color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
        padding: var(--space-8);
        text-decoration: none;
        z-index: 10000;
      }

      .skip-link:focus {
        top: 0;
      }

      .app-container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        height: 100vh;
        width: 100vw;
      }

      /* NAVBAR */
      .navbar {
        background: var(--color-surface);
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        padding: var(--space-12) var(--space-16);
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        gap: var(--space-16);
        flex-shrink: 0;
      }

      .navbar-brand {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: var(--space-12);
        font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        color: var(--color-primary);
      }

      .navbar-brand img {
        height: 32px;
      }

      .navbar-controls {
        display: flex;
        gap: var(--space-8);
        align-items: center;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
      }

      .btn {
        padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-16);
        border: none;
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
        background: var(--color-secondary);
        color: var(--color-text);
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
        transition: all calc(var(--duration-fast) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: var(--space-8);
      }

      .btn:hover {
        background: var(--color-secondary-hover);
      }

      .btn:focus-visible {
        outline: var(--focus-outline);
        outline-offset: 2px;
      }

      .btn-primary {
        background: var(--color-primary);
        color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
      }

      .btn-primary:hover {
        background: var(--color-primary-hover);
      }

      .btn.active {
        background: var(--color-primary);
        color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
      }

      /* MAIN CONTENT */
      .main-content {
        display: flex;
        flex: 1;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      /* SIDEBAR */
      .sidebar {
        width: 280px;
        background: var(--color-surface);
        border-right: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        transition: transform calc(var(--duration-normal) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
        overflow-y: auto;
      }

      .sidebar.collapsed {
        transform: translateX(-100%);
      }

      .sidebar-right {
        border-right: none;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--color-border);
      }

      .sidebar-right.collapsed {
        transform: translateX(100%);
      }

      .sidebar-header {
        padding: var(--space-16);
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
      }

      .sidebar-header h2 {
        font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
      }

      .sidebar-content {
        padding: var(--space-16);
        flex: 1;
      }

      /* TASKS */
      .task-list {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: var(--space-12);
      }

      .task-item {
        background: var(--color-background);
        border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
        padding: var(--space-12);
        transition: all calc(var(--duration-fast) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
      }

      .task-item:hover {
        box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
      }

      .task-header {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
      }

      .task-title {
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
      }

      .task-status {
        padding: var(--space-4) var(--space-8);
        border-radius: var(--radius-full);
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
      }

      .status-todo {
        background: var(--color-bg-2);
        color: var(--color-warning);
      }

      .status-in-progress {
        background: var(--color-bg-1);
        color: var(--color-info);
      }

      .status-done {
        background: var(--color-bg-3);
        color: var(--color-success);
      }

      .task-time {
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
        color: var(--color-text-secondary);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
      }

      .task-actions {
        display: flex;
        gap: var(--space-8);
        margin-top: var(--space-8);
      }

      .btn-sm {
        padding: var(--space-4) var(--space-8);
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
      }

      .progress-container {
        margin-top: var(--space-16);
      }

      .progress-bar {
        width: 100%;
        height: 8px;
        background: var(--color-secondary);
        border-radius: var(--radius-full);
        overflow: hidden;
        margin-top: var(--space-8);
      }

      .progress-fill {
        height: 100%;
        background: var(--color-primary);
        transition: width calc(var(--duration-normal) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
      }

      .add-task-form {
        margin-top: var(--space-16);
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: var(--space-8);
      }

      .form-input {
        padding: var(--space-8);
        border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
        background: var(--color-background);
        color: var(--color-text);
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        font-family: inherit;
      }

      .form-input:focus {
        outline: var(--focus-outline);
        outline-offset: 2px;
      }

      /* CANVAS */
      .canvas-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
      }

      .canvas-toolbar {
        background: var(--color-surface);
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        padding: var(--space-12) var(--space-16);
        display: flex;
        gap: var(--space-8);
        flex-wrap: wrap;
      }

      .canvas {
        flex: 1;
        position: relative;
        overflow: auto;
        background: var(--color-background);
      }

      .canvas-grid {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        background-image: linear-gradient(var(--color-border) 1px, transparent 1px),
          linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color-border) 1px, transparent 1px);
        background-size: 20px 20px;
        opacity: 0.3;
      }

      .canvas-content {
        position: relative;
        min-width: 100%;
        min-height: 100%;
      }

      /* NODES */
      .node {
        position: absolute;
        width: 160px;
        background: var(--color-surface);
        border: 2px solid;
        border-radius: var(--radius-md);
        padding: var(--space-12);
        cursor: move;
        box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        transition: box-shadow calc(var(--duration-fast) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
        user-select: none;
      }

      .node:hover {
        box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
      }

      .node.selected {
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px var(--color-primary);
      }

      .node.dragging {
        opacity: 0.7;
        cursor: grabbing;
      }

      .node-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: var(--space-8);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
      }

      .node-icon {
        font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
      }

      .node-title {
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        flex: 1;
      }

      .node-content {
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
        color: var(--color-text-secondary);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
      }

      .node-code {
        font-family: var(--font-family-mono);
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
        background: var(--color-background);
        padding: var(--space-8);
        border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
        overflow-x: auto;
        white-space: pre;
      }

      .node-ports {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-top: var(--space-8);
      }

      .node-port {
        width: 12px;
        height: 12px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--color-primary);
        cursor: pointer;
        border: 2px solid var(--color-surface);
        transition: transform calc(var(--duration-fast) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
      }

      .node-port:hover {
        transform: scale(1.3);
      }

      /* CONNECTIONS */
      .connections-svg {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        pointer-events: none;
        z-index: 1;
      }

      .connection-line {
        stroke: var(--color-primary);
        stroke-width: 2;
        fill: none;
        opacity: 0.6;
      }

      .connection-line.active {
        opacity: 1;
        stroke-width: 3;
      }

      /* BOTTOM PANEL */
      .bottom-panel {
        background: var(--color-surface);
        border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        transition: height calc(var(--duration-normal) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
        overflow: hidden;
        flex-shrink: 0;
      }

      .bottom-panel.collapsed {
        height: 40px !important;
      }

      .panel-header {
        padding: var(--space-12) var(--space-16);
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        cursor: pointer;
        user-select: none;
      }

      .panel-header h3 {
        font-size: var(--font-size-md);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
      }

      .panel-content {
        flex: 1;
        overflow: auto;
        padding: var(--space-16);
      }

      .code-display {
        font-family: var(--font-family-mono);
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        background: var(--color-background);
        padding: var(--space-16);
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
        overflow: auto;
        white-space: pre;
        border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
      }

      .console-output {
        font-family: var(--font-family-mono);
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        background: var(--color-background);
        padding: var(--space-16);
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
        border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        min-height: 100px;
      }

      .console-line {
        margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
      }

      .console-line.success {
        color: var(--color-success);
      }

      .console-line.error {
        color: var(--color-error);
      }

      /* VOICE COMMAND */
      .voice-command-fab {
        position: fixed;
        bottom: var(--space-24);
        right: var(--space-24);
        z-index: 1000;
      }

      .fab-button {
        width: 56px;
        height: 56px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--color-primary);
        color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: var(--font-size-2xl);
        box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        transition: all calc(var(--duration-normal) * var(--animation-speed))
          var(--ease-standard);
      }

      .fab-button:hover {
        transform: scale(1.1);
        box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
      }

      .voice-command-panel {
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 90px;
        right: var(--space-24);
        width: 320px;
        background: var(--color-surface);
        border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
        box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        padding: var(--space-16);
        z-index: 999;
        display: none;
      }

      .voice-command-panel.active {
        display: block;
      }

      .voice-feedback {
        margin-top: var(--space-12);
        padding: var(--space-12);
        background: var(--color-bg-3);
        border: 1px solid var(--color-success);
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
        color: var(--color-success);
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        display: none;
      }

      .voice-feedback.active {
        display: block;
      }

      /* SETTINGS */
      .settings-section {
        margin-bottom: var(--space-24);
      }

      .settings-section h3 {
        font-size: var(--font-size-md);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
      }

      .settings-group {
        margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
      }

      .settings-label {
        display: block;
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
      }

      .slider {
        width: 100%;
        height: 6px;
        border-radius: var(--radius-full);
        background: var(--color-secondary);
        outline: none;
        -webkit-appearance: none;
      }

      .slider::-webkit-slider-thumb {
        -webkit-appearance: none;
        width: 16px;
        height: 16px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--color-primary);
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      .slider::-moz-range-thumb {
        width: 16px;
        height: 16px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--color-primary);
        cursor: pointer;
        border: none;
      }

      .preset-buttons {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: var(--space-8);
      }

      /* ESOTERIC INFO */
      .esoteric-info {
        background: var(--color-bg-5);
        border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
        padding: var(--space-16);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
      }

      .esoteric-info h4 {
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
        margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
      }

      .esoteric-item {
        margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
      }

      .esoteric-item strong {
        color: var(--color-primary);
      }

      /* FOCUS MODE */
      body.focus-mode .sidebar,
      body.focus-mode .sidebar-right,
      body.focus-mode .navbar-controls > *:not(.btn-focus) {
        display: none;
      }

      body.focus-mode .canvas-container {
        margin: var(--space-16);
        border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
      }

      /* CELEBRATION */
      @keyframes celebrate {
        0%,
        100% {
          transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg);
        }
        25% {
          transform: scale(1.1) rotate(-5deg);
        }
        75% {
          transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
        }
      }

      .celebrating {
        animation: celebrate 0.5s ease-in-out;
      }

      /* NO ANIMATIONS */
      body.no-animations * {
        animation: none !important;
        transition: none !important;
      }

      /* KEYBOARD SHORTCUTS */
      .shortcuts-info {
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
        color: var(--color-text-secondary);
        margin-top: var(--space-12);
        padding: var(--space-12);
        background: var(--color-background);
        border-radius: var(--radius-base);
      }

      .shortcuts-info kbd {
        background: var(--color-secondary);
        padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-6);
        border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
        font-family: var(--font-family-mono);
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
      }

      /* RESPONSIVE */
      @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .sidebar,
        .sidebar-right {
          position: absolute;
          z-index: 100;
          height: 100%;
        }
      }

      /* ACCESSIBILITY */
      *:focus-visible {
        outline: var(--focus-outline);
        outline-offset: 2px;
      }

      [aria-live] {
        position: absolute;
        left: -10000px;
        width: 1px;
        height: 1px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body class="font-medium">
    <a href="#main-canvas" class="skip-link">Skip to main content</a>

    <div class="app-container">
      <!-- NAVBAR -->
      <nav class="navbar" role="navigation" aria-label="Main navigation">
        <div class="navbar-brand">
          <span>‚ö° HyperCode</span>
        </div>
        <div class="navbar-controls">
          <button class="btn" id="theme-light" aria-label="Light theme">
            ‚òÄÔ∏è Light
          </button>
          <button class="btn active" id="theme-dark" aria-label="Dark theme">
            üåô Dark
          </button>
          <button class="btn" id="theme-contrast" aria-label="High contrast theme">
            ‚ö´ High Contrast
          </button>
          <button
            class="btn btn-focus"
            id="focus-mode"
            aria-label="Toggle focus mode"
            aria-pressed="false"
          >
            üéØ Focus Mode
          </button>
        </div>
      </nav>

      <!-- MAIN CONTENT -->
      <div class="main-content">
        <!-- LEFT SIDEBAR: TASKS -->
        <aside class="sidebar" role="complementary" aria-label="Task list">
          <div class="sidebar-header">
            <h2>Tasks</h2>
            <button

              ‚óÄÔ∏è

            </div>

            <div class="progress-container">

                <div

        </aside>

        <!-- CANVAS -->
        <main class="canvas-container">
          <div class="canvas-toolbar">

            </button>
            <button class="btn" data-node-type="loop" aria-label="Add loop node">

            <button

            <button class="btn" data-node-type="output" aria-label="Add output node">

            </button>
            <button class="btn btn-primary" id="run-code" aria-label="Run code">

            </button>
            <button class="btn" id="clear-canvas" aria-label="Clear canvas">
              üóëÔ∏è Clear
            </button>
          </div>
          <div
            class="canvas"
            id="main-canvas"
            tabindex="0"
            role="application"
            aria-label="Node editor canvas"
          >
            <div class="canvas-grid"></div>
            <svg class="connections-svg" id="connections-svg">
              <!-- Connection lines will be drawn here -->
            </svg>
            <div class="canvas-content" id="canvas-content">
              <!-- Nodes will be dynamically inserted -->
            </div>
          </div>
        </main>

        <!-- RIGHT SIDEBAR: SETTINGS -->
        <aside
          class="sidebar sidebar-right"
          role="complementary"
          aria-label="Settings and accessibility"
        >
          <div class="sidebar-header">
            <h2>Settings</h2>
            <button

            >
              ‚ñ∂Ô∏è
            </button>
          </div>
          <div class="sidebar-content">
            <div class="settings-section">
              <h3>Accessibility</h3>

              <div class="settings-group">
                <label class="settings-label" for="font-size-select"> Font Size </label>
                <select id="font-size-select" class="form-input" aria-label="Font size">
                  <option value="small">Small</option>

              <div class="settings-group">

                    Dyslexia-Friendly

                </div>

            </div>

            <div class="settings-section">
              <h3>Esoteric Influences</h3>

      <!-- BOTTOM PANEL: CODE & CONSOLE -->

          <button class="btn btn-sm" id="toggle-panel" aria-label="Toggle code panel">
            ‚ñº
          </button>

    <!-- VOICE COMMAND FAB -->
